description: Guidelines and guidance for vets, farmers and animal keepers on the responsible use of antimicrobials.

details.body:
This list brings together links to guidance and guidelines on responsible use of antimicrobials in animals. It covers information produced by government and animal health organisations.

List of guidelines and guidance on the responsible use of antimicrobials in animals

Links correct as of 26 September 2024 – if you find a link no longer works, or you would like to add to this list please email: amr@vmd.gov.uk
